GSD.description:
perf hist: Fix memory leak of a perf_hpp_fmt

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.84 by commit a4c17ebdd6249cb4e061358d3693383f6628e069. For more details please see the references link.
